name: @isomorphic-git/cors-proxy
description: Proxy clone and push requests for the browser

scripts.test-local: rm -rf test-temp && mkdir test-temp && npx isomorphic-git clone --corsProxy="http://localhost:9999" --url="https://github.com/isomorphic-git/isomorphic-git.git" --dir="./test-temp"

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
